title: Q1 - If an Indian user’s data is processed abroad (e.g., on AWS servers in the U.S.), is the foreign company also bound by DPDPA?
description: Yes. Under the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA), any foreign company that processes personal data of individuals located in India — even if the processing happens outside India — is legally bound by the DPDPA.
